Отличный шутор от первого лица. Признан лучшей игрой 2013 года. Моё положительное мнение относится ко всему аспекту этого шедевра , и сюжет , и графика , и мелочи которые наполняют игру особым смыслом и атмосферой происходящей в этой игре. Советую всем.
A challenge that won't let you go unrewarded.
Прекрассная игра о псевдокрасивой жизни, сложных науках, доверии, политики и многом другом. Много слов будут излишни, просто поиграйте и не пожалеете.
Bioshock Infinite comment dire, et bien un jeu excellent (graphisme, solo, personnages attachants) tout est fait pour apprécier :D !
Excellent jeu, tant pour les amateurs de FPS que pour ceux voulant juste suivre l'histoire (qui est géniale).

The Bioshock Series gets better and better with every game! Rich story, fascinating characters, brilliant score, brilliant voice acting and brilliant ending! Burial at Sea is an amazing DLC as well! 

10000/10
An amazing piece of story telling
An awesome story and a really nice gameplay. Often comes on sale. Burial at sea 1+2 (DLC) is like a whole new game and it connects so well with bioshock 1.

Мне очень понравилась игра сюжет и вообще все что в нец есть шедевр просто 10/10 . Всем советую поиграть кто не играл . Особенно советю людям которые любят шутеры от первого лица . Побольше бы таких игр . Всем удачи в прохождении .

Improved combat, great story, and epic art direction make for a good game. Ken levine is a genious writer and with the return to Rapture for continuity of the base games story you will have plenty of play time and mind blowing plot twists to discover. One of the few games were the DLC is actualy worth it. Infinite is a great follow up to the original BioShock (i dont really count 2 lol) with its own beautiful setting in the sky. The skyhook adds a whole new element to the combat along with the return of Vigors (plasmids) and gun play. Characters and enemies are orginal and look and act like they are truly a part of the city of columbia bringing you in for an imersive gameplay experience (A.I. can be a little dumb at times). All in all its a well rounded FPS  and you'll have loads of fun seeing Booker and Elizabeth through Columbia and Rapture. 9/10

Что сказать об этой игре? Красиво, атмосферно, и... скучно. Несмотря на якобы открытые пространства, игра гонит нас по узким коридорам, с которых никуда не свернуть. И если в подводном городе предыдущих частей это воспринималось как естественное и обоснованное ограничение(всё же город под водой), то среди облачных  высей небесного города это реально бесит. Введение воздушных трасс должно было разнообразить игру, увеличив количество измерений, в которых перемещается игрок, но этого не случилось. Спрыгивать можно только в отдельных, заранее определённых точках, а от попыток в полёте разглядеть цели, которые палят(и попадают) в тебя с огромного расстояния болят глаза. Твой выбор, несмотря на жалкие попытки разработчиков сделать сюжет более-менее ролеплейным, ни на что не влияет - рельсы и ещё раз рельсы. Спойлерить о концовке не буду, расскажу только свои главные ощущения: удивление и разочарование. Хотел бы сказать больше, но для этого придётся спойлерить, а я не хочу портить игру, тем, кто все-таки решится её купить. Так и не понял, откуда столько хвалебных отзывов, на мой взгляд, игра тянет максимум на 6 из 10, не более.

"There's always a man, a lighthouse and a city"
    -One word, 'Mindfcked' towards the hole bioshock series.

Grandioses Spiel mit "Suchtfaktor".

Habe das Spiel innerhalb von knapp 8 Stunden durchgespielt, was ich etwas schade finde. Da ich von der Spiellänge bei einem so storylastigen Titel mehr erwartet hätte. 

Das Spiel fängt mit einer hellen und freundlichen "GutelauneEinhorn-Ponyhof-Atmosphäre" an und entwickelt sich immer weiter zum schaurigen Düsterspiel.

Man geht mit dem "Held" der Geschichte auf die Suche nach Elisabeth, die in einer riesigen Statue gefangen gehalten wird. Nach dem man diese befreit hat wir man von allen verfügbaren Kräften gejagt und als der "falsche Hirte" im neuen Eden propagandiert. 

Wirklich sehr schön gemachte Story mit einer ausgesprochen interessanten Atmosphäre. Ich will nicht Spoilern, aber ich kann dieses Spiel nur empfehlen. 

Viel Action, Geballere, Blut, Spezialkräfte um Gegner Platt zu machen. Verschiedenste Waffen die man durch (im Spiel gefundenes) Geld optimieren kann. Viele Dialoge und eine sehr detailreiche und liebevoll Gestaltete Welt. Humor, Ernsthaftigkeit, eine schöne Entwicklung der Charaktere... das Spiel hat einfach alles was man sich wünscht. 

Ich persönlich halte nicht viel von Ego-Shootern, die sich darin versuchen eine Story unterzubringen, da diese meist nur Nebensache ist... hier hat man aber einen shooterlastigen Singleplayer mit viel Geschichte die einen wirklich fesselt und die ein offenes Ende hat, welches einen zum Nachdenken anregt.

Die 8 Stunden Spielzeit habe ich am Stück durchgejagt. Eine ausführliche Review werde ich noch auf meinem Blog www.thezerosphere.de abgeben.

Невероятная игра, ретро-шутер в зазеркалье! Возможность побывать в мире, из которого не каждый захочет вернуться. Увлекательный сюжет в сочетании с отменной графикой и геймплеем смогут вас поглотить целиком и полностью. Оценка игры 10 из 10

If you enjoy the bioshock series you'll most likely enjoy this as well. It has less of the Rapturefeeling, but hey - it's still really nice. A great story, fantastic environment and a  pretty neat fightingsystem. So.. would you kindly go buy this game?

Brilliant game ans story!

Quite possibly one of the best series in video game history, along with Half-Life and Portal. Bioshock Infinite doesn't provide monotonous gore and drudgery as some other FPS do; instead it creates a beautiful story reflecting on American history and steampunk-esque themes, to create a fantasy alternate reality told through the expected violence that the Bioshock series normally employs. Very enthralling and very cinematic, everytime I play I look forward to the "cutscenes" (not exactly cutscenes per se, but rather moments of intense story-moving events still in firstperson) to further uncover the mysteries in the City of Columbia.
This game's ending shrekt me.
This game broke me.

Это последний продукт (включая обе части Burial at Sea), который сделан оригинальным разработчиком. Что бы ни было дальше - это будет другая игра. Биошок меняется, бывает изматывающим, нравится не всем - но одноо у него не отнять. Биошок - это уникальный мир, с неповторимой атмосферой и сложным сюжетом. Вы не будете разочарованы. Все части игры стоят вашего внимания, уж поверьте. 9/10
Игра которую я советую абсолютно всем , но при одном условии- ознакомиться с прошлыми играми вселенной!
I haven't looked at reality the same way after I beat this game. Greart buy at any price. 10/10

An instant classic. If your looking for revolutionary gameplay mechanics this is not the game for you. This game uses the basic first person shooter gameplay as its foundation and delivers top notch story and immersion. One of the most memorable games in the last decade.

Fast paced FPS single player shooter. One of the best FPS games I have ever played. It requires quick thinking and movement to be able to get past some of the enemies. Story is engaging and well thought of. Booker Dewitt's character isnt just the protagonist but in a sense his own antagonist. As the story goes on, the player will find out what really happened. Makes the Bioshock series one of the best PC games of history.

This is by far one of the best First Person Shooters I've ever played. 

The gameplay is fantastic, utilizing both your gun and vigors. The story is so deep and powerful, giving you a feeling of legitiment connections with both Booker Dewitt and Elizabeth. The game's graphics look phenominal, even on the Mac. I was also suprised when I clocked the game in at 14 and a half hours.

+Amazing Story
+Beautiful Graphics
+Great gameplay
+Long game (For an FPS)

- IA could have been smarter
- The ending is the only thing more confusing than Inception (Not really a con, but beware)

Overall, I would reccomend this game the anyone I meet

10/10

This is easily one of the best games I've ever played. 

It has one of those stories that makes you keep playing from start to finish in one session just because it is THAT epic. The graphics are stunning and every area that you visit in Columbia looks amazing. 

Gameplay is good as well, but being able to carry more weapons would've been nice (some people may disagree). You also run out of ammo quite frequently, which usually isn't a problem since you can pick some up from dead enemies on the ground most of the time.

Elizabeth is probably the best "sidekick" that I've ever encountered in a game. She's never in your way and enemies do not attack her, she will also throw you ammo, health salts and money during fights (which makes you miss her every time you have to go get her back because she's been kidnapped, ran off etcetera).

Do yourself a favor and get this game. Pick up Bural at Sea episode 1 and 2 while you're at it as well.
meh.. ok i guess.

Overall a great First-Person Shooter with an AMAZING story. My only complaint are the few moments of monotony in the middle of the game when you are in generic hallways fighting the same enemies. These moments are broken though when the greatest moments of the story begin. If you do not enjoy FPS games you may find it hard to stick with this one. Otherwise the game was a great experience. 9/10

After playing the game and  both "Burried at Sea" episodes, part of me thinks this might very well have the best storyline and ending of any game I've ever played. The other part of me wants to flip my desk over.

10/10, would ponder my existance again

Una obra de arte.

Bioshock Infinite é sem duvidas nenhuma o jogo com o melhor final que eu ja joguei. Eu o considero um jogo curto, porém isso é resolvido rapidamente com uma historia envolvente, e personagens carismaticos, que fazem você explorar mais e mais a vida sobre eles.
Ele também apresenta graficos estonteantes, sem ao menos exigir um PC poderoso, isso mostra como o jogo foi bem otimizado para plataforma.

Se existisse um Oscar dos video games, eu dava o premio a esse jogo.

An excellent game, even if the story mode is a little short. The extras of he audio diaries create an immersive backstory tht rewards exploration. A few glitches, but nothing detrimental to the player.

Шедевр - другого слова , которым эту игру описать нету. Сюжет, атмосфера, графика - всё на высшем уровне. Искуственный интелект сделал вашу спутницу Элизабет настолько живой что порой кажеться что с вами бегает живой человек. Ни сикунды времени вас не заставят скучать в этой игре - хотите сломя голову бежать по сюжету? - действуйте , хотите найти пасхалки, секретки и много полезного? - дерзайте. Вообщем 10 из 10!

I honestly can't understand why this game has received the praise that it has. It's like every reviewer is new to the scene. There's absolutely nothing new here to be seen. It's a very well done shooter. I'm not going to say that it's not flawless in it's execution, but let's take music as a comparison: Just because a musician plays a complicated piece flawlessly doesn't necessarily make it amazing music. You can appreciate the technicality involved in playing such a piece, but not like the music itself. 

This is exactly how I viewed BioShock Inifinite. Technically, it was flawless. However, it was far from a great game. Although I played it all the way through, I actually felt like I wanted to get it over with because it was becoming boring. Yes, it's overall a good game, but it's lacking seriously in creativity.
Great game with beautiful graphics

This game is basically fighting the same enemies in different areas. The storyline is a bit off, and honestly, the boss fights are pretty easy. I've beaten this game a few times and it still lacks the challenge for me. Sure, it's fun the first time you play it, but even how cheap it is, you could spend your money on a better game. I am not trying to diss the game and its fans, but frankly, I'm sure they could've done better.

Great game, it was a perfect follow up from the rest of the BioShock Series. Granted there was times that I felt horribly under powered with certain weapon combo's or weapon selections. If you wanted to play this game with very little use of the Vigor's your in for a rough ride.

After finishing the game you feel you wanted more of the Beginning. Getting a feel for the starting area. If your a fan of getting around and then exploring the worlds around you, then you will be in for a suprise. All the hipe that was put into the game fell short for me but it was still an enjoyable experience till certain points.

Beautiful visuals(even though my graphics card is shite), gameplay-wise is fun, FPS shooter with a "twist" and story-wise is one of the best you'll ever play, ever. 
Game lead and writers are geniuses, never seen a story that had so many plot holes and just when you couldn't understand anything anymore, they introduce a huge plot twist at the end that actually reveals that you are not human and you are a chicken. Yes. A chicken that plays videogames. Jesus Christ what am I doing with my life.

Das man jetzt in den Wolken ist und nicht unter Wasser, die Musikalische Untermalung, das Spielverhalten, die Umgebungen und so vieles mehr was ich aufzählen könnte was dieses Spiel zu unglaublich  gut macht.

"Bioshock" es, posiblemente, la mejor saga de videojuegos que se ha creado (aunque siempre seré un incondicional del "Half Life"). Su mecánica de juego, y, sobre todo, su historia, hacen de "Bioshock" una maravilla que roza la perfección. Además, los dos DLC (lejos de ser el "típico" contenido descargable destinado a sacarnos los cuartos) cierran de manera ilustre toda esta fascinante historia. 100% recomendable.
